text: KLBC-TV2 (Call Sign: WNTV305) is a Television Station airing a local Morning Shows, Law Enforcement., and News show, broadcasting on Las Vegas Area Local cable channel 3. The station serves Bullhead City, Laughlin, Kingman, and Needles. It is owned by Lin Clark. KLBC-TV2 brings local, and national breaking news == External links == KLBC-TV2 == References == Category:Television stations in Nevada
title: KLBC-TV2
